full_summary:
Title:**Netting Rental for Forest Restoration, Gulf Islands National Park Reserve**
### Solicitation Information
* **Solicitation Number:** 5P420-23-0207/A 
* **Publication Date:** November 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** January 3, 2024 at 16:00:00
* **Contracting Entity Name:** Parks Canada Agency
* **Contracting Entity Address:** Suite #720, 220 – 4th Avenue S.E., Calgary, AB T2G4X3, Canada
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Name: Emilie Goulet
	+ Email: emilie.goulet@pc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (403) 497-6534
	+ Fax: 1-866-246-6893
### Solicitation Overview
Parks Canada requires the rental of netting for temporary fencing to facilitate the eradication of fallow deer from Sidney Island. The scope of work includes:
* Customizing and delivering 29 to 39 km of netting
* Ensuring timely delivery of the netting to Sidney Island before June 30, 2024
### Instructions to Bidders
Bids received by fax and email will be accepted as official. However, Parks Canada is not currently accepting bids via SAP Ariba. Bidders must submit their bids via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation document.
* Acceptable email address: soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca
* Acceptable fax number: 1-866-246-6893
Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted. Scheduled deliveries of the netting should be made directly to Sidney Island before the deadline.
* The maximum email file size is 15 MB. Bidders are responsible for any failure attributable to the transmission or receipt of the emailed bid due to file size.
### Additional Information
* National Parks Regulations require that all work be performed in accordance with the ordinances, laws, rules, and regulations set out in the National Park Act.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Late submissions will not be considered.
### Further Inquiry
Enquiries of a technical and contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority. Please allow sufficient time for response before the tender closing date. Demands received after the deadline may result in no response being provided.
